root.title: stora close complet papyru takeov
root.body: sweden stora kopparberg bergslag ab skp st say acquir 90 pct share rival pulp paper maker papyru ab thu pas threshold compulsorili buy rest compani remain sharehold would later month sell share stora compani say statement stora announc last septemb would acquir papyru price 5.8 billion crown thu form europ second large forest group london bas reed intern plc reed l
